ya10.3.1:9.1: puggalā aññindriyaṁ bhāventi → sakadāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṁ bhāveti (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | Aggamaggasamaṅgī → aggamaggasamaṅgino (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.3.1:34.1: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānanti, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāventi. Tayo maggasamaṅgino ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññindriyañca na bhāventi → etthantare pāṭho si, sya1ed potthakesu natthi
